fields.name: Flood
fields.description: Risk of flash flooding, river flood, or coastal surge.

fields.name: Earthquake
fields.description: Seismic risk including structural damage and injury.

fields.name: Fire
fields.description: Risk of structural fire, wildfire, or explosion.

fields.name: Cyber Attack
fields.description: Risk of ransomware, data breach, or infrastructure disruption.

fields.name: Infectious Disease
fields.description: Pandemics, outbreaks, or other biologic threats.
